### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE labeled_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT NOT NULL,
    label VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    reinforcement_score FLOAT NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'comment' WHERE id = 1
